metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1450 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in MP4v2 2.1.2 and classified as problematic.This issue affects the function DumpTrack of the file mp4trackdump.cpp. Themanipulation leads to denial of service. The attack needs to be approachedlocally. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Theassociated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-223295.

criterions.comment: mp4v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
